summary: The role of the Junior Industrial Designer will be to work closely with our design team to cultivate new product ideas, develop & design those ideas into real products, and then devise strategies to make those products successful.
description:
The role of the Junior Industrial Designer will be to work closely with our design team to cultivate new product ideas, develop & design those ideas into real products, and then devise strategies to make those products successful.

We’re looking for someone who is passionate about their career. Our environment is fast-paced, collaborative, and positive—an ideal fit for someone who likes to run with their ideas and work with a creative team to bring them to life.
experience:
• Preferred 1-3 years in a design-oriented environment (in addition to an academic setting).
• Proof of skill in form of portfolio, projects, and/or design competitions.
• Preferred (but not required) 4-Year college or university and/or design/engineering/manufacturing program
• Strong communication skills to confidently explain and inform design, component, and structure-based design elements.
• Must be proactive, show desire to learn, and thrive on creativity.
• Need superior multi-tasking skills to effectively manage multiple projects simultaneously.
• Self-confidence to work in a high-performing collaborative environment.
• Skills in 3D rendering and design software (Inventor, Autodesk, Solidworks etc).
• Ability to prep 3D files for manufacturing.

summary: The role of the Project Assistant will be to manage the office environment and maintain team productivity. This role will include video and photography assisting, community relations, sample room management, customer service, etc. There will be a lot of opportunity for learning and expanding this position into graphic design, social media, marketing, project management, etc., depending on candidate’s interests.
description:
The role of the Project Assistant will be to manage the office environment and maintain team productivity. This role will include video and photography assisting, community relations, sample room management, customer service, etc. There will be a lot of opportunity for learning and expanding this position into graphic design, social media, marketing, project management, etc., depending on candidate’s interests. 

We’re looking for a detail-oriented, consistent learner who likes getting things done and has a passion for collaborating with creative people.
experience:
• Preferred: experience with office management, exec. assisting, and/or start-up environments.
• Need superior multi-tasking skills to effectively manage multiple roles simultaneously.
• Strong personal and digital communication skills, confidence, and positive demeanor.
• Must be proactive, show desire to learn, and thrive on creativity.
• Self-confidence to work in a high-performing collaborative environment.

Note: This position is for a 'junior level' project assistant. Free free to email pkohm@greatergoods.com if you have any questions regarding experience, education, etc.

summary: The role of the Javascript Developer is to build high-level systems to support the development and sale of products on multiple retail platforms. Examples of such systems include: integrations with smartphone applications, email marketing, website development, e-commerce design, etc. This role will also involve developing intelligent technology associated with a vast array of smart and/or wireless products.
description:
The role of the Javascript Developer is to build high-level systems to support the development and sale of products on multiple retail platforms. Examples of such systems include: integrations with smartphone applications, email marketing, website development, ecommerce design, etc. This role will also involve developing intelligent technology associated with a vast array of smart and/or wireless products.

We’re looking for someone who has a passion for developing products and networks that help people live and work more easily through technology.
experience:
• Preferred 1-3 years in a coding/developer-oriented environment.
• Proof of skill in form of portfolio, project, and/or design competition.
• Preferred but not required: 4-year college or university degree.
• Strong communication skills; ability to confidently explain and inform tech concepts.
• Must be proactive, show desire to learn, and thrive on creativity and collaboration.
• Self-confidence to work in a high-performing collaborative environment.
• Preferred skills: HTML5, CSS3, AngularJS, Javascript, NodeJS, NoSQL Databases (MongoDB), Cordova, Git. (Any combination of these programs)
• Familiarity with Linux server environments and Amazon web services is a plus.
